review_data.title: Really good :))
review_data.content: Great food, super quick and friendly service :) doesn't look like much from the outside but it's actually really great!

review_data.title: Pizzeria Incrocio fantastic
review_data.content: Don’t judge a book by its cover, this is a super restaurant filled with atmosphere, great service and great food. White tablecloths too. The pizzas are outstanding !! Well worth a visit.

review_data.title: Einfach und gut, für Zürich sogar preiswert!
